DOC.brief_summary: Multi-center , randomize Phase II study evaluate efficacy safety OSI-7904Lversus 5 FU/LV biliary tract cancer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study OSI-7904L Versus 5-FU/LV Treatment Patients With Biliary Tract Cancer
DOC.criteria: Documented locally advanced metastatic adenocarcinoma biliary tract ; Adequate bone marrow , hepatic renal function ; Bilirubin < = 1.5 time upper limit normal ; Age 18 year old ; Predicted life expectancy 12 week ; Prior surgery radiation therapy permit provided patient recover adequately ; At least 1 target lesion > = 20 mm ( > = 10 mm spiral CTscan ) ; ECOG Performance Status 02 ; No prior chemotherapy locally advanced metastatic disease . Adjuvant/neoadjuvant permit therapy complete least 12 month prior study entry ; Concurrent anticancer therapy study ; History malignancy within past 3 year except basal squamous cell carcinoma situ cervical cancer ; Symptomatic brain metastasis stable require radiation past 28 day ;
